channel.title: About Pixelfed
channel.description:
Photo sharing. For everyone.
[Pixelfed](https://pixelfed.org) is a free and ethical photo sharing platform, powered by ActivityPub federation.
# GitHub
- https://github.com/pixelfed/pixelfed -- source code - https://github.com/pixelfed/support -- issues with deployment - https://github.com/pixelfed/ideas -- file feature requests or suggestions here
# Project chat
- #pixelfed on freenode.net -- general discussion - https://matrix.to/#/#freenode_#pixelfed:matrix.org -- Matrix bridge - #pixelfed_dev on freenode.net -- technical discussion
# Social media
- https://mastodon.social/@pixelfed -- project announcements - https://mastodon.social/@pixeldev -- dev announcements

item.title: About Pixelfed
item.dc:creator: trwnh
item.description:
Photo sharing. For everyone.

Pixelfed is a free and ethical photo sharing platform, powered by ActivityPub federation.

GitHub

  • https://github.com/pixelfed/pixelfed – source code
  • https://github.com/pixelfed/support – issues with deployment
  • https://github.com/pixelfed/ideas – file feature requests or suggestions here

Project chat

  • #pixelfed on freenode.net – general discussion
    • https://matrix.to/#/#freenode_#pixelfed:matrix.org – Matrix bridge
  • #pixelfed_dev on freenode.net – technical discussion

Social media

  • https://mastodon.social/@pixelfed – project announcements
  • https://mastodon.social/@pixeldev – dev announcements
